00055  * vvp_ prefix stands for "Vfs Vm Posix". It corresponds to historical
00056  * "llite_" (var. "ll_") prefix.

00059 static struct kmem_cache *ll_thread_kmem;
00060 struct kmem_cache *vvp_lock_kmem;
00061 struct kmem_cache *vvp_object_kmem;
00062 static struct kmem_cache *vvp_session_kmem;
00063 static struct kmem_cache *vvp_thread_kmem;

00065 static struct lu_kmem_descr vvp_caches[] = {
00066         {
00067                 .ckd_cache = &ll_thread_kmem,
00068                 .ckd_name  = "ll_thread_kmem",
00069                 .ckd_size  = sizeof(struct ll_thread_info),
00070         },
00071         {
00072                 .ckd_cache = &vvp_lock_kmem,
00073                 .ckd_name  = "vvp_lock_kmem",
00074                 .ckd_size  = sizeof(struct vvp_lock),
00075         },
00076         {
00077                 .ckd_cache = &vvp_object_kmem,
00078                 .ckd_name  = "vvp_object_kmem",
00079                 .ckd_size  = sizeof(struct vvp_object),
00080         },
00081         {
00082                 .ckd_cache = &vvp_session_kmem,
00083                 .ckd_name  = "vvp_session_kmem",
00084                 .ckd_size  = sizeof (struct vvp_session)
00085         },
00086         {
00087                 .ckd_cache = &vvp_thread_kmem,
00088                 .ckd_name  = "vvp_thread_kmem",
00089                 .ckd_size  = sizeof(struct vvp_thread_info),
00090         },
00091         {
00092                 .ckd_cache = NULL
00093         }
00094 };

00096 static void *ll_thread_key_init(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00097                                 struct lu_context_key *key)
00098 {
00099         struct ll_thread_info *lti;
00100 
00101         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(lti, ll_thread_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00102         if (lti == NULL)
00103                 lti = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00104 
00105         return lti;
00106 }
00107 
00108 static void ll_thread_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00109                                struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
00110 {
00111         struct ll_thread_info *lti = data;
00112 
00113         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(lti, ll_thread_kmem);
00114 }
00115 
00116 struct lu_context_key ll_thread_key = {
00117         .lct_tags = LCT_CL_THREAD,
00118         .lct_init = ll_thread_key_init,
00119         .lct_fini = ll_thread_key_fini,
00120 };
00121 
00122 static void *vvp_session_key_init(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00123                                   struct lu_context_key *key)
00124 {
00125         struct vvp_session *session;
00126 
00127         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(session, vvp_session_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00128         if (session == NULL)
00129                 session = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00130         return session;
00131 }
00132 
00133 static void vvp_session_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00134                                  struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
00135 {
00136         struct vvp_session *session = data;
00137         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(session, vvp_session_kmem);
00138 }
00139 
00140 struct lu_context_key vvp_session_key = {
00141         .lct_tags = LCT_SESSION,
00142         .lct_init = vvp_session_key_init,
00143         .lct_fini = vvp_session_key_fini
00144 };

00147                                  struct lu_context_key *key)
00148 {
00149         struct vvp_thread_info *vti;
00150 
00151         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(vti, vvp_thread_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00152         if (vti == NULL)
00153                 vti = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00154         return vti;
00155 }
00156 
00157 static void vvp_thread_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00158                                 struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
00159 {
00160         struct vvp_thread_info *vti = data;
00161         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(vti, vvp_thread_kmem);
00162 }
00163 
00164 struct lu_context_key vvp_thread_key = {
00165         .lct_tags = LCT_CL_THREAD,
00166         .lct_init = vvp_thread_key_init,
00167         .lct_fini = vvp_thread_key_fini,
00168 };

00170 /* type constructor/destructor: vvp_type_{init,fini,start,stop}(). */
00171 LU_TYPE_INIT_FINI(vvp, &ll_thread_key, &vvp_session_key, &vvp_thread_key);

00173 static const struct lu_device_operations vvp_lu_ops = {
00174         .ldo_object_alloc      = vvp_object_alloc
00175 };
00176 
00177 static struct lu_device *vvp_device_free(const struct lu_env *env,
00178                                          struct lu_device *d)
00179 {
00180         struct vvp_device *vdv  = lu2vvp_dev(d);
00181         struct cl_site    *site = lu2cl_site(d->ld_site);
00182         struct lu_device  *next = cl2lu_dev(vdv->vdv_next);
00183 
00184         if (d->ld_site != NULL) {
00185                 cl_site_fini(site);
00186                 OBD_FREE_PTR(site);
00187         }
00188 
00189         cl_device_fini(lu2cl_dev(d));
00190         OBD_FREE_PTR(vdv);
00191         return next;
00192 }
00193 
00194 static struct lu_device *vvp_device_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00195                                           struct lu_device_type *t,
00196                                           struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
00197 {
00198         struct vvp_device *vdv;
00199         struct lu_device *lud;
00200         struct cl_site *site;
00201         int rc;
00202         ENTRY;
00203 
00204         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(vdv);
00205         if (vdv == NULL)
00206                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00207 
00208         lud = &vdv->vdv_cl.cd_lu_dev;
00209         cl_device_init(&vdv->vdv_cl, t);
00210         vvp2lu_dev(vdv)->ld_ops = &vvp_lu_ops;
00211 
00212         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(site);
00213         if (site != NULL) {
00214                 rc = cl_site_init(site, &vdv->vdv_cl);
00215                 if (rc == 0)
00216                         rc = lu_site_init_finish(&site->cs_lu);
00217                 else {
00218                         LASSERT(lud->ld_site == NULL);
00219                         CERROR("Cannot init lu_site, rc %d.\n", rc);
00220                         OBD_FREE_PTR(site);
00221                 }
00222         } else
00223                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00224         if (rc != 0) {
00225                 vvp_device_free(env, lud);
00226                 lud = ERR_PTR(rc);
00227         }
00228         RETURN(lud);
00229 }
00230 
00231 static int vvp_device_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *d,
00232                            const char *name, struct lu_device *next)
00233 {
00234         struct vvp_device  *vdv;
00235         int rc;
00236         ENTRY;
00237 
00238         vdv = lu2vvp_dev(d);
00239         vdv->vdv_next = lu2cl_dev(next);
00240 
00241         LASSERT(d->ld_site != NULL && next->ld_type != NULL);
00242         next->ld_site = d->ld_site;
00243         rc = next->ld_type->ldt_ops->ldto_device_init(
00244                 env, next, next->ld_type->ldt_name, NULL);
00245         if (rc == 0) {
00246                 lu_device_get(next);
00247                 lu_ref_add(&next->ld_reference, "lu-stack", &lu_site_init);
00248         }
00249         RETURN(rc);
00250 }
00251 
00252 static struct lu_device *vvp_device_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00253                                          struct lu_device *d)
00254 {
00255         return cl2lu_dev(lu2vvp_dev(d)->vdv_next);
00256 }
00257 
00258 static const struct lu_device_type_operations vvp_device_type_ops = {
00259         .ldto_init = vvp_type_init,
00260         .ldto_fini = vvp_type_fini,
00261 
00262         .ldto_start = vvp_type_start,
00263         .ldto_stop  = vvp_type_stop,
00264 
00265         .ldto_device_alloc      = vvp_device_alloc,
00266         .ldto_device_free       = vvp_device_free,
00267         .ldto_device_init       = vvp_device_init,
00268         .ldto_device_fini       = vvp_device_fini,
00269 };
00270 
00271 struct lu_device_type vvp_device_type = {
00272         .ldt_tags     = LU_DEVICE_CL,
00273         .ldt_name     = LUSTRE_VVP_NAME,
00274         .ldt_ops      = &vvp_device_type_ops,
00275         .ldt_ctx_tags = LCT_CL_THREAD
00276 };

00282 int vvp_global_init(void)
00283 {
00284         int rc;
00285 
00286         rc = lu_kmem_init(vvp_caches);
00287         if (rc != 0)
00288                 return rc;
00289 
00290         rc = lu_device_type_init(&vvp_device_type);
00291         if (rc != 0)
00292                 goto out_kmem;
00293 
00294         return 0;
00295 
00296 out_kmem:
00297         lu_kmem_fini(vvp_caches);
00298 
00299         return rc;
00300 }
00301 
00302 void vvp_global_fini(void)
00303 {
00304         lu_device_type_fini(&vvp_device_type);
00305         lu_kmem_fini(vvp_caches);
00306 }
00307 
00308 /*****************************************************************************
00309  *
00310  * mirror obd-devices into cl devices.
00311  *
00312  */
00313 
00314 int cl_sb_init(struct super_block *sb)
00315 {
00316         struct ll_sb_info *sbi;
00317         struct cl_device  *cl;
00318         struct lu_env     *env;
00319         int rc = 0;
00320         __u16 refcheck;
00321 
00322         sbi  = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00323         env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00324         if (!IS_ERR(env)) {
00325                 cl = cl_type_setup(env, NULL, &vvp_device_type,
00326                                    sbi->ll_dt_exp->exp_obd->obd_lu_dev);
00327                 if (!IS_ERR(cl)) {
00328                         sbi->ll_cl = cl;
00329                         sbi->ll_site = cl2lu_dev(cl)->ld_site;
00330                 }
00331                 cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00332         } else
00333                 rc = PTR_ERR(env);
00334         RETURN(rc);
00335 }
00336 
00337 int cl_sb_fini(struct super_block *sb)
00338 {
00339         struct ll_sb_info *sbi;
00340         struct lu_env     *env;
00341         struct cl_device  *cld;
00342         __u16              refcheck;
00343         int                result;
00344 
00345         ENTRY;
00346         sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00347         env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00348         if (!IS_ERR(env)) {
00349                 cld = sbi->ll_cl;
00350 
00351                 if (cld != NULL) {
00352                         cl_stack_fini(env, cld);
00353                         sbi->ll_cl = NULL;
00354                         sbi->ll_site = NULL;
00355                 }
00356                 cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00357                 result = 0;
00358         } else {
00359                 CERROR("Cannot cleanup cl-stack due to memory shortage.\n");
00360                 result = PTR_ERR(env);
00361         }
00362 
00363         RETURN(result);
00364 }
00365 
00366 /****************************************************************************
00367  *
00368  * /proc/fs/lustre/llite/$MNT/dump_page_cache
00369  *
00370  ****************************************************************************/
00371 
00372 /*
00373  * To represent contents of a page cache as a byte stream, following
00374  * information if encoded in 64bit offset:
00375  *
00376  *       - file hash bucket in lu_site::ls_hash[]       28bits
00377  *
00378  *       - how far file is from bucket head              4bits
00379  *
00380  *       - page index                                   32bits
00381  *
00382  * First two data identify a file in the cache uniquely.
00383  */
00384 
00385 #define PGC_OBJ_SHIFT (32 + 4)
00386 #define PGC_DEPTH_SHIFT (32)
00387 
00388 struct vvp_pgcache_id {
00389         unsigned                 vpi_bucket;
00390         unsigned                 vpi_depth;
00391         uint32_t                 vpi_index;
00392 
00393         unsigned                 vpi_curdep;
00394         struct lu_object_header *vpi_obj;
00395 };
00396 
00397 static void vvp_pgcache_id_unpack(loff_t pos, struct vvp_pgcache_id *id)
00398 {
00399         CLASSERT(sizeof(pos) == sizeof(__u64));
00400 
00401         id->vpi_index  = pos & 0xffffffff;
00402         id->vpi_depth  = (pos >> PGC_DEPTH_SHIFT) & 0xf;
00403         id->vpi_bucket = ((unsigned long long)pos >> PGC_OBJ_SHIFT);
00404 }
00405 
00406 static loff_t vvp_pgcache_id_pack(struct vvp_pgcache_id *id)
00407 {
00408         return
00409                 ((__u64)id->vpi_index) |
00410                 ((__u64)id->vpi_depth  << PGC_DEPTH_SHIFT) |
00411                 ((__u64)id->vpi_bucket << PGC_OBJ_SHIFT);
00412 }
00413 
00414 static int vvp_pgcache_obj_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00415                                struct hlist_node *hnode, void *data)
00416 {
00417         struct vvp_pgcache_id   *id  = data;
00418         struct lu_object_header *hdr = cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
00419 
00420         if (id->vpi_curdep-- > 0)
00421                 return 0; /* continue */
00422 
00423         if (lu_object_is_dying(hdr))
00424                 return 1;
00425 
00426         cfs_hash_get(hs, hnode);
00427         id->vpi_obj = hdr;
00428         return 1;
00429 }
00430 
00431 static struct cl_object *vvp_pgcache_obj(const struct lu_env *env,
00432                                          struct lu_device *dev,
00433                                          struct vvp_pgcache_id *id)
00434 {
00435         LASSERT(lu_device_is_cl(dev));
00436 
00437         id->vpi_depth &= 0xf;
00438         id->vpi_obj    = NULL;
00439         id->vpi_curdep = id->vpi_depth;
00440 
00441         cfs_hash_hlist_for_each(dev->ld_site->ls_obj_hash, id->vpi_bucket,
00442                                 vvp_pgcache_obj_get, id);
00443         if (id->vpi_obj != NULL) {
00444                 struct lu_object *lu_obj;
00445 
00446                 lu_obj = lu_object_locate(id->vpi_obj, dev->ld_type);
00447                 if (lu_obj != NULL) {
00448                         lu_object_ref_add(lu_obj, "dump", current);
00449                         return lu2cl(lu_obj);
00450                 }
00451                 lu_object_put(env, lu_object_top(id->vpi_obj));
00452 
00453         } else if (id->vpi_curdep > 0) {
00454                 id->vpi_depth = 0xf;
00455         }
00456         return NULL;
00457 }
00458 
00459 static loff_t vvp_pgcache_find(const struct lu_env *env,
00460                                struct lu_device *dev, loff_t pos)
00461 {
00462         struct cl_object     *clob;
00463         struct lu_site       *site;
00464         struct vvp_pgcache_id id;
00465 
00466         site = dev->ld_site;
00467         vvp_pgcache_id_unpack(pos, &id);
00468 
00469         while (1) {
00470                 if (id.vpi_bucket >= CFS_HASH_NHLIST(site->ls_obj_hash))
00471                         return ~0ULL;
00472                 clob = vvp_pgcache_obj(env, dev, &id);
00473                 if (clob != NULL) {
00474                         struct inode *inode = vvp_object_inode(clob);
00475                         struct page *vmpage;
00476                         int nr;
00477 
00478                         nr = find_get_pages_contig(inode->i_mapping,
00479                                                    id.vpi_index, 1, &vmpage);
00480                         if (nr > 0) {
00481                                 id.vpi_index = vmpage->index;
00482                                 /* Cant support over 16T file */
00483                                 nr = !(vmpage->index > 0xffffffff);
00484                                 page_cache_release(vmpage);
00485                         }
00486 
00487                         lu_object_ref_del(&clob->co_lu, "dump", current);
00488                         cl_object_put(env, clob);
00489                         if (nr > 0)
00490                                 return vvp_pgcache_id_pack(&id);
00491                 }
00492                 /* to the next object. */
00493                 ++id.vpi_depth;
00494                 id.vpi_depth &= 0xf;
00495                 if (id.vpi_depth == 0 && ++id.vpi_bucket == 0)
00496                         return ~0ULL;
00497                 id.vpi_index = 0;
00498         }
00499 }
00500 
00501 #define seq_page_flag(seq, page, flag, has_flags) do {                  \
00502         if (test_bit(PG_##flag, &(page)->flags)) {                  \
00503                 seq_printf(seq, "%s"#flag, has_flags ? "|" : "");       \
00504                 has_flags = 1;                                          \
00505         }                                                               \
00506 } while(0)
00507 
00508 static void vvp_pgcache_page_show(const struct lu_env *env,
00509                                   struct seq_file *seq, struct cl_page *page)
00510 {
00511         struct vvp_page *vpg;
00512         struct page      *vmpage;
00513         int              has_flags;
00514 
00515         vpg = cl2vvp_page(cl_page_at(page, &vvp_device_type));
00516         vmpage = vpg->vpg_page;
00517         seq_printf(seq, " %5i | %p %p %s %s %s | %p "DFID"(%p) %lu %u [",
00518                    0 /* gen */,
00519                    vpg, page,
00520                    "none",
00521                    vpg->vpg_defer_uptodate ? "du" : "- ",
00522                    PageWriteback(vmpage) ? "wb" : "-",
00523                    vmpage,
00524                    PFID(ll_inode2fid(vmpage->mapping->host)),
00525                    vmpage->mapping->host, vmpage->index,
00526                    page_count(vmpage));
00527         has_flags = 0;
00528         seq_page_flag(seq, vmpage, locked, has_flags);
00529         seq_page_flag(seq, vmpage, error, has_flags);
00530         seq_page_flag(seq, vmpage, referenced, has_flags);
00531         seq_page_flag(seq, vmpage, uptodate, has_flags);
00532         seq_page_flag(seq, vmpage, dirty, has_flags);
00533         seq_page_flag(seq, vmpage, writeback, has_flags);
00534         seq_printf(seq, "%s]\n", has_flags ? "" : "-");
00535 }
00536 
00537 static int vvp_pgcache_show(struct seq_file *f, void *v)
00538 {
00539         loff_t                   pos;
00540         struct ll_sb_info       *sbi;
00541         struct cl_object        *clob;
00542         struct lu_env           *env;
00543         struct vvp_pgcache_id    id;
00544         __u16                    refcheck;
00545         int                      result;
00546 
00547         env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00548         if (!IS_ERR(env)) {
00549                 pos = *(loff_t *) v;
00550                 vvp_pgcache_id_unpack(pos, &id);
00551                 sbi = f->private;
00552                 clob = vvp_pgcache_obj(env, &sbi->ll_cl->cd_lu_dev, &id);
00553                 if (clob != NULL) {
00554                         struct inode *inode = vvp_object_inode(clob);
00555                         struct cl_page *page = NULL;
00556                         struct page *vmpage;
00557 
00558                         result = find_get_pages_contig(inode->i_mapping,
00559                                                       id.vpi_index, 1, &vmpage);
00560                         if (result > 0) {
00561                                 lock_page(vmpage);
00562                                 page = cl_vmpage_page(vmpage, clob);
00563                                 unlock_page(vmpage);
00564 
00565                                 page_cache_release(vmpage);
00566                         }
00567 
00568                         seq_printf(f, "%8x@"DFID": ", id.vpi_index,
00569                                    PFID(lu_object_fid(&clob->co_lu)));
00570                         if (page != NULL) {
00571                                 vvp_pgcache_page_show(env, f, page);
00572                                 cl_page_put(env, page);
00573                         } else
00574                                 seq_puts(f, "missing\n");
00575                         lu_object_ref_del(&clob->co_lu, "dump", current);
00576                         cl_object_put(env, clob);
00577                 } else
00578                         seq_printf(f, "%llx missing\n", pos);
00579                 cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00580                 result = 0;
00581         } else
00582                 result = PTR_ERR(env);
00583         return result;
00584 }
00585 
00586 static void *vvp_pgcache_start(struct seq_file *f, loff_t *pos)
00587 {
00588         struct ll_sb_info *sbi;
00589         struct lu_env     *env;
00590         __u16              refcheck;
00591 
00592         sbi = f->private;
00593 
00594         env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00595         if (!IS_ERR(env)) {
00596                 sbi = f->private;
00597                 if (sbi->ll_site->ls_obj_hash->hs_cur_bits > 64 - PGC_OBJ_SHIFT)
00598                         pos = ERR_PTR(-EFBIG);
00599                 else {
00600                         *pos = vvp_pgcache_find(env, &sbi->ll_cl->cd_lu_dev,
00601                                                 *pos);
00602                         if (*pos == ~0ULL)
00603                                 pos = NULL;
00604                 }
00605                 cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00606         }
00607         return pos;
00608 }
00609 
00610 static void *vvp_pgcache_next(struct seq_file *f, void *v, loff_t *pos)
00611 {
00612         struct ll_sb_info *sbi;
00613         struct lu_env     *env;
00614         __u16              refcheck;
00615 
00616         env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00617         if (!IS_ERR(env)) {
00618                 sbi = f->private;
00619                 *pos = vvp_pgcache_find(env, &sbi->ll_cl->cd_lu_dev, *pos + 1);
00620                 if (*pos == ~0ULL)
00621                         pos = NULL;
00622                 cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00623         }
00624         return pos;
00625 }
00626 
00627 static void vvp_pgcache_stop(struct seq_file *f, void *v)
00628 {
00629         /* Nothing to do */
00630 }
00631 
00632 static struct seq_operations vvp_pgcache_ops = {
00633         .start = vvp_pgcache_start,
00634         .next  = vvp_pgcache_next,
00635         .stop  = vvp_pgcache_stop,
00636         .show  = vvp_pgcache_show
00637 };
00638 
00639 static int vvp_dump_pgcache_seq_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *filp)
00640 {
00641         struct ll_sb_info       *sbi = PDE_DATA(inode);
00642         struct seq_file         *seq;
00643         int                     result;
00644 
00645         result = seq_open(filp, &vvp_pgcache_ops);
00646         if (result == 0) {
00647                 seq = filp->private_data;
00648                 seq->private = sbi;
00649         }
00650         return result;
00651 }
00652 
00653 const struct file_operations vvp_dump_pgcache_file_ops = {
00654         .owner   = THIS_MODULE,
00655         .open    = vvp_dump_pgcache_seq_open,
00656         .read    = seq_read,
00657         .llseek  = seq_lseek,
00658         .release = seq_release,
00659 };
